TopicTitle: Will parachutes open up at a certain height automatically?

Articles.Content:
I have learned from YouTube that the best point to open up the chutes is around 5,000 meters up, for Kerbin, and that they start to really grab air around 500 meters. But will they open automatically anyway at a certain height from the surface? Do you have to hit the space bar or click on them with the mouse to trigger them?

Edited August 2, 2013 by Valley

The parachutes partially deploy around 21,000 meters above the surface, and they fully deploy exactly 500 meters above the ground. So if the terrain you're above is at 3,000 meters, they will fully deploy at 3,500.

Drogue chutes have slightly different parameters. I'm not sure how they're set up.
Hitting space will semi-deploy the chutes provied there's enough atmosphere to allow for it, they'll fully deploy by themselves at lower altitudes.

I just want to point out a few things wrong here:

2. The stage does not have to be activated in order for the chute to deploy. Parachutes can be activated by action groups.
